column2: parking spaces are like the Hope Diamond
column4: but good luck ever thinking you will possess it. Uchi does provide complimentary valet parking due to the lack of street parking available
column5: but complimentary still means that you end up paying a tip
column6: so it's really not complimentary. The valet is in the back behind Uchi
column7: making it not exactly curb side valet service.
